channel.title: Microsoft Learn - in Intune
channel.description: The latest updates from Microsoft Learn in Intune

item.title: Centrally manage Admin Tasks - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Use the centralized Admin tasks view in Microsoft Intune to manage common administrative tasks from across Intune capabilities.

item.title: What's new in Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Find out what's new in Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Troubleshooting Endpoint Analytics - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Troubleshoot Microsoft Intune endpoint analytics, including device enrollment issues, startup performance, and data collection problems.

item.title: Set up SentinelOne MTD with Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: How to set up the SentinelOne Mobile Threat Defense (MTD) solution with Microsoft Intune to control mobile device access to your corporate resources.

item.description: Create an Intune device compliance policy that uses your MTD partner threat levels to determine if a mobile device can access company resources.

item.description: Use Intune to add Mobile Threat Defense (MTD) apps, Microsoft Authenticator app, and iOS configuration policy in Microsoft Intune

item.description: How to set up the Pradeo Mobile Threat Protection with Microsoft Intune to control mobile device access to your corporate resources.

item.description: Integrate the third-party mobile threat defense solution of Better Mobile with Microsoft Intune.

item.description: How to set up the Trellix Mobile Security mobile threat defense (MTD) solution with Microsoft Intune to control mobile device access to your corporate resources

item.description: How to set up the Pradeo Mobile Threat Protection solution with Microsoft Intune to control mobile device access to your corporate resources.

item.description: How to use the Sophos Mobile solution with Microsoft Intune to control mobile device access to your corporate resources.

item.description: How to set up the Symantec Endpoint Protection Mobile solution with Microsoft Intune to control mobile device access to your corporate resources.

item.description: Use Intune Mobile Threat Defense (MTD) with your Mobile Threat Defense partner to protect access to company resources based on device risk.

item.description: How to set up CylancePROTECT Mobile (BlackBerry) with Microsoft Intune to control mobile device access to your corporate resources

item.title: Configure schedules to gradually roll out Windows Updates in Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Configure schedules that manage how and when Windows updates roll out to your managed devices with Microsoft Intune.

item.title: In development - Microsoft Intune
item.description: This article describes Microsoft Intune features that are in development.

item.title: Microsoft Intune Enterprise Application Management - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn about Enterprise App Management and the Enterprise App Catalog in Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Create a policy using settings catalog in Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Use settings catalog in Microsoft Intune to configure thousands of settings for Windows 10/11, iOS/iPadOS, macOS, and Android client devices, including Microsoft Office apps, Microsoft Edge, administrative templates (ADMX), and more. Add these settings in a device configuration profile to secure devices, and control different programs and features. Use Microsoft Copilot to get What If analysis, and learn more about each setting.

item.title: Learn about Windows Driver updates policy for Windows devices in Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn about using Microsoft Intune policy to manage Windows driver updates.

item.title: Add an iOS/iPadOS Line-of-Business App to Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn about how to add an iOS/iPadOS line-of-business (LOB) app to Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Data storage and processing in Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how personal data is stored and processed in Intune.

item.title: Understand Microsoft Intune Management Extension - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Understand Microsoft Intune management extension for Windows.

item.title: Manually Add the Windows Company Portal App - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how your workforce can manually add the Windows 10 Company Portal app to their PC from the Microsoft Store.

item.title: Monitor App Information and Assignments - Microsoft Intune
item.description: After you assign an app to users or devices, use this information to help you monitor the app's status.

item.title: Manage Microsoft Edge on iOS and Android With Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Use Intune app protection and configuration policies with Microsoft Edge for iOS and Android to ensure corporate websites are always accessed with safeguards in place.

item.title: File and command reference for Microsoft Tunnel Gateway, a VPN solution for Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Find file and command-line references for tools you use to install or manage the Microsoft Tunnel Gateway, a VPN server that runs on Linux.

item.title: Data collection in Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn about personal data collected in Intune.

item.title: Tutorial-Get started with cloud-native Windows endpoints - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Set up secure cloud-native Windows endpoints that are Microsoft Entra joined, enrolled in Intune, and then deploy at scale with Windows Autopilot.

item.title: Enroll Android Enterprise dedicated, fully managed, or corporate-owned work profile devices in Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how to enroll Android Enterprise dedicated, fully managed, or corporate-owned work profile devices in Intune.

item.title: iOS/iPadOS App Protection Policy Settings - Microsoft Intune
item.description: This article describes the iOS/iPadOS app protection policy (APP) settings for iOS/iPadOS devices.

item.title: Microsoft Intune product and capabilities documentation - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn more about how Microsoft Intune products and capabilities can help you secure, deploy, and manage users, apps, and endpoint devices.

item.title: Planning guide to move to Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Plan, design, implement, adopt, and move to Microsoft Intune. Get guidance and advice to determine goals, use-case scenarios and requirements, and create rollout and communication plans, support, testing, and validation plans.

item.title: Device features and settings in Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Overview of the different Microsoft Intune device profiles. Get info on GPO, features, restrictions, email, wifi, VPN, education, certificates, upgrade Windows 10/11, BitLocker and Microsoft Defender, and custom device configuration settings in the Microsoft Intune admin center. Use these profiles to manage and protect data and devices in your company.

item.title: Configure Windows Update rings policy in Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Create and manage Intune policy for Windows update rings. You can configure, deploy, and pause update installation with Windows Update client policies using Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Microsoft Intune Government Service overview - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn more about the Intune government service offerings and features. This article is designed to serve as an overview of the Microsoft Intune offering for government community cloud (GCC) High and United States Department of Defense (DoD) environments.

item.title: Use Windows Update for Business reports for Windows Updates in Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Use Windows Update for Business reports to view data for Windows Updates you deploy with Intune.

item.title: Windows Delivery Optimization settings in Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Configure device configuration policy to manage Delivery Optimization settings on Windows devices you manage with Intune.

item.title: Windows Update settings you can manage with Intune Update Ring policies for Windows devices. - Microsoft Intune
item.description: View the settings for Windows Update that you can manage through Intune policy for Update rings.

item.title: Apple configuration list for Intune settings catalog - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Use the Microsoft Intune settings catalog to add, configure, or restrict features on Apple devices. This article lists and describes the settings you can configure.

item.title: Windows Delivery Optimization settings for Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Delivery Optimization settings for Windows devices that you can deploy using Intune.

item.title: Get started with macOS endpoints - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Microsoft Intune guide to set up and configure macOS devices from setup to creating policies and enrolling devices. You secure your corporate and organization-owned endpoints that are enrolled in Intune, and then deploy at scale with Apple Business Manager or Apple School Manager.

item.title: Use Intune to expedite Windows quality updates - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Use Microsoft Intune policy to expedite the installation of Windows updates on managed devices as soon as possible.

item.title: Use Microsoft Intune to manage software updates for supervised iOS/iPadOS devices - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Use Microsoft Intune to manage system updates for supervised iOS/iPadOS devices.

item.title: Set permissions to Managed Home Screen using Android Enterprise OEMConfig - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Add the Samsung Knox Service Plugin, Zebra OEMConfig Powered by MX, and Legacy Zebra OEMConfig apps to Intune, and use the app schemas to configure permissions for the Managed Home Screen (MHS) app on Android Enterprise devices.

item.title: Protect devices with Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn about the Intune capabilities that can help you protect your devices and data against unauthorized access and other threats.

item.title: Configure security, email, VPN, and Wi-Fi device configuration profiles - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Step 4 to deploy device configuration profiles as part of the minimum set of policies for your devices using Microsoft Intune. The starting point is to enable the firewall, install AV, scan for malware, install software updates, create a strong PIN policy, and create email, VPN, and Wi-Fi device configuration profiles.

item.title: Use Windows compatibility reports for Windows updates in Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Use the app and driver compatibility reports for Windows devices before you deploy Intune policies for feature updates or update rings.

item.title: Use Microsoft Intune policies to manage macOS software updates - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Use Microsoft Intune to manage system updates for supervised macOS devices.

item.title: Windows cloud configuration step by step guide - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Use this Windows 10/11 cloud configuration step-by-step setup guide to create your own cloud configuration deployment. You create the Microsoft Entra group and policies using Microsoft Intune, including the enrollment profile, compliance policy, and security baseline. You also deploy apps and resources that users need to do their jobs.

item.title: Use the Vulnerability Remediation Agent to Manage Vulnerabilities - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how to use the Vulnerability Remediation Agent in Microsoft Intune to identify, prioritize, and remediate security vulnerabilities across your managed devices.

item.title: Android FOTA Updates - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Use Microsoft Intune to manage firmware updates on Android devices. A FOTA update can include software and security patches, feature updates, and other changes to the device's firmware.

item.title: Zebra LifeGuard Over-the-Air Integration with Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Use Microsoft Intune to manage firmware updates for supported Zebra devices.

item.title: Admin checklist for iOS/iPadOS software updates in Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Guidance and advice for administrators that create and manage software updated for iOS/iPadOS devices using Microsoft Intune. See sample policy for different industry scenarios, including shared devices, kiosk, manufacturing, and information worker.

item.title: Windows quality update policy - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Use Hotpatch updates to receive security updates without restarting your device

item.title: Admin guide and checklist for macOS software updates - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Guidance and advice for administrators that create and manage software updates for macOS devices using Microsoft Intune. Use this article to help manage software updates on your organization-owned devices, including how to create policies, manage updates, and review update status.

item.title: Admin checklist for software updates on BYOD in Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Guidance and advice for administrators that create and manage software updated for BYOD and personally owned devices using Microsoft Intune. See tasks and settings that can manage updates on personal devices on Android and iOS/iPadOS platforms.

item.title: Use Windows Holographic devices with Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Use Microsoft Intune to manage and complete different tasks on devices running Windows Holographic for Business and HoloLens. You can configure the Company Portal app, create a compliance policy, customize OMA-URI settings, deploy apps, categorize devices in groups, create profiles, restrict devices, enable software updates, set terms and conditions, configure VPN and Wi-Fi settings, and use Hello for Business.

item.title: View Software Update Reports for Apple Devices - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Track Apple device update status in real time with Intune's declarative software update reporting. Learn how Microsoft Intune surfaces update changes directly from managed Apple devices.

item.title: Use Windows cloud configuration in a guided scenario - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Use a guided scenario to configure Windows 10/11 client devices in a cloud configuration in Microsoft Intune. Cloud config focuses on a simplified device experience for internet browsing and using Microsoft 365 apps, including Microsoft Teams.

item.title: Software update errors and descriptions in Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: See a list of the Software Update agent error code in Microsoft Intune, including the error code, symbolic name, and error description.

item.title: Common tasks and features in the settings catalog - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Use the settings catalog in Microsoft Intune to configure common features. You can create a Universal Print policy, configure Microsoft Edge and Google Chrome web browsers, and use built in settings instead of plist files for macOS devices.

item.title: Enable use of Windows diagnostic data by Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Enable Windows diagnostic data in processor configuration for your tenant to enable its use by Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Deployment guide to manage iOS/iPadOS devices in Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: A guide to managing iOS/iPadOS devices in Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Update your workloads to support cloud-native endpoints - Microsoft Intune
item.description: To support hybrid and remote workers, convert or migrate your workloads to support cloud-native endpoints. This planning guide focuses on deploying apps and updates with Intune, moving from Group Policy Objects, and using Windows Autopilot.

item.title: Microsoft Intune Reports - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Intune provides specific report types with focused views that contain consistent and timely data.

item.title: Create Windows Driver updates policy in Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Use Microsoft Intune to manage policies that install Windows driver updates on your Intune managed Windows devices.

item.title: Deploy Remote Help with Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Follow the steps to deploy Remote Help with Microsoft Intune on Windows, macOS, and Android Enterprise.

item.title: Admin checklist for Android software updates in Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Guidance and advice for administrators that create and manage software updated for Android devices using Microsoft Intune. See tasks and settings that can manage updates on corporate owned Android Enterprise devices.

item.title: Use Intune Suite add-on capabilities - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Microsoft Intune Suite unifies a series of mission-critical advanced endpoint management and security capabilities. The capabilities of the suite are integrated with Microsoft 365 and Microsoft Security across endpoint platforms for both cloud and on-premises co-managed devices.

item.title: Configure Update Policies for Apple Devices - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how to configure software update policies for Apple devices using Apple's Declarative Device Management (DDM) model. Improve security, reduce user disruption, and ensure compliance with reliable, automated updates across your organization.

item.title: Configure feature updates policy for Windows devices in Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Create and manage Intune policy for Windows feature updates. Configure and deploy policy to maintain the Windows feature version of Windows devices you manage with Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Work From Anywhere Report in Endpoint Analytics - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Discover how the Work from Anywhere report in Microsoft Intune endpoint analytics provides insights into remote productivity, device readiness, and user experience.

item.title: Custom settings - Windows Holographic for Business devices - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Add or create a custom profile to use the OMA-URI settings for devices running Windows Holographic for Business in Microsoft Intune, including Microsoft HoloLens. You can set AllowFastReconnect, AllowVPN, AllowUpdateService, UpdateServiceURL, RequireUpdatesApproval, ApprovedUpdates, and ApplicationLaunchRestrictions policy configuration service provider (CSP) settings.

item.title: Distributed IT with multiple admins - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn about scaling guidelines for Microsoft Intune when you have a large number of local admins who need to manage their own users/devices and policies within the same tenant. Use Microsoft Intune's Role Based Access Control to manage access.

item.title: Learn about using Windows Update client policies in Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Manage Windows software updates by using Intune policy for Update rings for Windows and Windows feature updates for Windows Update client policies in Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Android App Protection Policy Settings - Microsoft Intune
item.description: This article describes the app protection policy settings for Android devices.

item.title: Network endpoints for US government deployments - Microsoft Intune
item.description: See the list of US government endpoint URLs that Intune needs and requires. Allow the ports, IP addresses, and endpoint URLs in your proxy server configuration.

item.title: Network endpoints for Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Review endpoints for Intune. This page lists IP addresses and port settings needed for proxy settings in your Intune deployments.
